text: Greatest Hits is the second compilation album by American singer-songwriter Mariah Carey. It was released in the United States on December 4, 2001. It features all of Carey's songs from when she was signed to Columbia. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2001 albums Category:Greatest hits albums Category:Mariah Carey albums Category:Pop albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Columbia Records albums Category:Virgin Records albums
title: Greatest Hits (Mariah Carey album)
